title.rendered: Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge 32GB UK SIM-Free Smartphone – Titanium Silver – (Renewed)

content.rendered:
Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge This is the Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge. As the most recent member of the Galaxy S household, it is obtained all of the options you have come to know and love. Water resistance, quick charging and the return of expandable storage – it is all there. But the Galaxy S7 Edge is greater than only a cellphone – it is the important thing to a Galaxy of experiences. Pair it with a Gear VR and unlock a complete world of gaming, cinema and extra. The Galaxy S7 Edge’s highly effective processors take your digital actuality expertise to the subsequent stage. Get daily notifications on the fly, with Gear S2 and wearables. No Galaxy can be full with out an superior digicam. Samsung’s smartphone digicam know-how makes taking pictures in any situation – even low mild – end in prime quality images, each time. The Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge is one the main smartphones in the marketplace. Crafted from prime quality supplies, their ergonomic designs provide fashion with out compromising on sturdiness or energy. Beyond a cellphone, there’s a Galaxy.

Make certain this matches by getting into your mannequin quantity.
3600 mAh battery. Get as much as 27h speak time (3G calls)
Android Marshmallow 6.0
